rows.label: qst201332_msg0001
rows.name: It can't be. I won't accept it!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0002
rows.name:
A genius like me, defeated
by these wretches?!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0003
rows.name:
Hana had look at kidnapped
littlepon. All seem safe and fine!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0004
rows.name: That's good to hear.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0005
rows.name:
The Superbian army will take care
of transporting the children
safely back to their families.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0006
rows.name:
So that just leave this
man. What we do with him?

rows.label: qst201332_msg0007
rows.name:
I guess we can't exactly
just abandon him here...

rows.label: qst201332_msg0008
rows.name:
Satisfying though it would be to
strike him down where he stands...

rows.label: qst201332_msg0009
rows.name:
I suppose we should take him to be
judged by the proper authorities.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0011
rows.name: I agree with Tokiha on this one.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0012
rows.name:
Let's hand him over to
the Superbian army.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0013
rows.name: Yeah, I guess Tokiha's right.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0014
rows.name:
Let's hand him over to
the Superbian army.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0015
rows.name: Tokiha has the right idea, I think.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0016
rows.name:
It seems best to let the
Superbian army decide his fate.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0017
rows.name: I'm with Tokiha on this one.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm sure the Superbian officials can
figure out what to do with him.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0024
rows.name: Very well.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0025
rows.name:
Though I feel quite certain he
will be sentenced to no less
than 50 years of imprisonment.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0026
rows.name: F...fifty...?!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0019
rows.name:
Rex... Thank you for allowing me
to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0021
rows.name:
Don't thank me... I don't know
what we'd have done without you.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0022
rows.name:
It's thanks to you that all the children
are safe. If anything, I'm the one who's
grateful to you - everyone is!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0023
rows.name:
Your words are all the
reward I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0020
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0027
rows.name:
Nia... Thank you for allowing me
to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0028
rows.name:
Nah, don't thank me.
Actually, I don't know what
we'd've done without you!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0029
rows.name:
If it weren't for you, who knows what
might've happened to those kids? We're
all grateful for your hard work!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0030
rows.name:
Your words are all the
reward I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0031
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0032
rows.name:
Meleph... Thank you for allowing
me to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0033
rows.name:
Please, do not thank me. It is
us who should be thanking you.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0034
rows.name:
If it were not for you, I fear we would
never have been able to secure the
children's safety. So thank you, Tokiha.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0035
rows.name:
Your words are all the
reward I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0036
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0037
rows.name:
Zeke... Thank you for allowing
me to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0038
rows.name:
Hey hey, don't you go thanking me.
I'm just glad we had you around!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0039
rows.name:
Who knows what would've happened to
those kids if you hadn't found 'em?
We should all be thanking you!

rows.label: qst201332_msg0040
rows.name:
Your words are all the
reward I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201332_msg0041
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!
